item.title: ViteJS native modules
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before ES modules was supported in the browser, we have no native mechanism for authoring javascript-modules in a modularized fashion. That is why the concept of “bundling” and tools like Webpack, Rollup, and Parcel exist to improve the development experience for frontend developers.
